==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|あつ|にゅう|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|zhx|ja|sort=あつにゅう}} {{m|zh|sc=Hani|壓入}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|kyu=壓入|あつにゅう|hhira=あつにふ}}

# [[press|Pressing]] something in under [[pressure]]: [[inject]]ing.
# {{lb|ja|chemistry|sort=あつにゅう}} [[forcing|Forcing]].
# {{lb|ja|chemistry|sort=あつにゅう}} [[penetration|Penetration]].
# {{lb|ja|chemistry|machining|sort=あつにゅう}} A press [[fit]].
# {{lb|ja|medical|sort=あつにゅう}} An [[indentation]].
